abstract: Stylianos "Stelios" Malezas (Greek: Στέλιος Μαλεζάς; born 11 March 1985) is a Greek footballer who plays as a defender for Fortuna Düsseldorf in the Fußball-Bundesliga.
comment: Stylianos "Stelios" Malezas (Greek: Στέλιος Μαλεζάς; born 11 March 1985) is a Greek footballer who plays as a defender for Fortuna Düsseldorf in the Fußball-Bundesliga.
